Help.Brief: AUTOKICK - Add, delete or list phrases that automatically kick users when spoken.

Detail.autokick: AUTOKICK add BADWORD AUTOKICK delete BADWORD AUTOKICK list - This allows you to set special words or phrases (regular expressions) that will automatically kick users if spoken. Use '!autokick add WORD' to add a word or phrase to the list, '!autokick delete WORD' to remove one, and '!autokick list' to list them all. The list is channel specific. - To change the message sent to users as they are kicked out, use this command: - !config set AutoKick/KickMessage Your Message Here
